short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that helps you share website feedback with your team and clients, directly on the site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you create tags with messages on live websites and share it with clients or team members. This runs together with a dashboard in www.sitedots.com
